I Am Kay The

I specialize in Frontend and Backend Web development using JavaScript.

View My Work

I Specialize In

Web Develover creating digital masterpieces and UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile applications.

Frontend

Implementing the front-end logic that defines the behavior of the visual elements of a web application. Connecting with the the back-end.

UI/UX

Performing code analysis and usability. Optimizing applications, ensuring UI/UX feasibility, and implementing API designs and architecture.

Design Led Web Develover

Combine the art of design with the art of programming. Work alongside other front-end web developers who specialize in markup and styling.

Agile Development Practices

Continuously plan the release of product and strives to optimize its value throughout the development phase.

About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Seeking Web Developer Career Opportunity.

Passionate to build things and always been curious and wanted to know how software operates behind an application system. So, I joined a few introductive web development courses and dived into teaching myself HTML, CSS and JavaScript. During this time, I earned a Prince 2 Agile practitioner accreditation. Eventually, I decided to take the leap, took a Software Engineer Immersive course at General Assembly, and set myself up for a new journey. Everyday, I continue to practice programming and shapen my skills in web development.
